str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To pray, wish. Middle voice of a primary verb; to wish; by implication, to pray to God.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
No one, none, nothing.
Bad, evil, in the widest sense. Apparently a primary word; worthless, i.e. depraved, or injurious.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
Approved, acceptable, tried. From dokeo; properly, acceptable, i.e. Approved.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Failing to pass the test, unapproved, counterfeit. By implication, worthless.
